value.title: Add Zoom Sliders on Axis in Power BI Visual
value.excerpt: Sometimes, there is a need to examine a smaller range of data in a chart without using any additional filters. Zoom sliders will help us a lot in those scenarios. value.title: Can you refresh a single table in Power BI?
value.excerpt: Frustrated that a you can only do a full refresh? Patrick takes it to the next level by showing how you can refresh only a single table in your Power BI dataset. This is a great option for targeted refresh and avoid potential overhead.
